title: Best Riven skin??
body:
just wanna know what riven skin people think is the best (beside champ riv) i'm not looking to main her or anything but i have all her skins and me and a friend are going to be doing some silly stuff down in bot and just kind wanna know which skin to use 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I really like the sound affects for arcade riven even though I hardly ever play her it's fun when I do play her and remember I have that skin
Yeah if your a feeding riven go Arcade for the KO

I personally really like dragonblade for aesthetics, but from what I've heard the animation canceling is smoother on practically every other riven skin, if you're already used to the animation (since dragonblade has different particles).
Arcade because it's smoothest IMO for animation fast combos
